mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (imp_uid, merchant_uid, pay_method, pay_amount, pay_status, paid_at, created_at, pNum, mNum, oNum) VALUES (#{impUid}, #{merchantUid}, #{payMethod}, #{payAmount}, #{payStatus}, #{paidAt}, NOW(), #{pNum}, #{mNum}, #{oNum})
mapper.select: SELECT p.payment_id AS payment_id, p.imp_uid AS imp_uid, p.merchant_uid AS merchant_uid, p.pay_method AS pay_method, p.pay_amount AS pay_amount, p.pay_status AS pay_status, p.paid_at AS paid_at, p.created_at AS created_at, p.oNum AS oNum, p.pNum AS pNum, p.mNum AS mNum, pkg.pName AS pName, pkg.pPrice AS pPrice FROM payment p JOIN package pkg ON p.pNum = pkg.pNum ORDER BY p.payment_id DESC
